column1: Baby Barnaby's////I found hair in the most horrible
column2: dry pancakes I've ever had. If that's not disgusting enough
column4: damp seats and sticky tables should finish it off for you. I have no idea how this place is so well rated. Please
column5: if you're coerced into dining here
column6: your future self will thank you for not ordering the pancakes. And hopefully you don't have the pleasure of pulling long curly hairs out of your food. Yelp has never led me this badly astray.
